description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3897i","text":"This SOP defines the pancreas donor profile acceptable for use by the Alberta Diabetes Institute IsletCore in their human islet isolation program. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcc0o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60s13","text":"ADI IsletCore receives pancreases from multiple Canadian Organ Procurement Organizations (OPO). The OPO reports anonymized donor information and serology results to ADI IsletCore. Informed consent for research use of the pancreas is obtained and held on record by the relevant OPO. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bs2l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"f9nqj","text":"ADI IsletCore's human islet isolation, distribution and biobanking program is approved by the University of Alberta research ethics board: Pro00013094.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines:
{"blocks":[{"key":"evh0v","text":"Responsibilities
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"r9ci","text":"This SOP applies to the Alberta Diabetes Institute IsletCore.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"df3kn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cpcmm","text":"It is the responsibility of ADI IsletCore staff to both follow and ensure adherence to the donor criteria outlined in this SOP prior to acceptance      of pancreata.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8ql3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nenb","text":"It is the responsibility of the ADI IsletCore staff to ensure that information relating to the donor is provided by the Organ Procurement Organization (OPO), and that this is accurately recorded in IsletCoreâ€™s database, and the accompanying paperwork is filed securely. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6t8cq","text":"

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1h280","text":"The following are ADI IsletCore inclusion criteria for pancreas donors for human islet isolation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":97}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3v45e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e08","text":"A multi-organ donor or pancreas-only donor if the donor meets all the criteria for multi-organ donation","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"r37g","text":"Any type of donation (NDD, DCD, MAiD)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c6sm","text":"DCD warm ischemia time \u003c30 minutes","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2o46v","text":"Adequate in situ hypothermic perfusion using UW or similar organ preservation solution for perfusion and cold storage","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d031n","text":"Maximum 24 hour cold ischemia","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8gp98","text":"Donor age of 0 years to 100 years (no minimum age)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gg72","text":"Any donor body mass index (BMI)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2avj1","text":"Any donor HbA1c","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9upo","text":"Any donor diabetes status (no diabetes, Type 1 diabetes, Type 2 diabetes, other types of diabetes)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6a2qq","text":"Peak amylase between 40 to 140 units per litre (no data also acceptable)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s9ep","text":"Peak lipase between 0 to 160 units per litre","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lfd5","text":"Duration of life support \u003c 14 days","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfar0","text":"Warm ischemia / Down time \u003c 60 minutes (including CPR)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"405nm","text":"The following represent disease states or other conditions that are criteria for rejection of a potential donor. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":113}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mlf5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2bdf7","text":"Recently treated (last 2 years) or active tuberculosis","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mno9","text":"Serious illness of unknown etiology as the cause of death","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bv88p","text":"Active viral encephalitis or encephalitis of unknown origin","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqa5l","text":"Creutzfeldtâ€“Jacob Disease","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5sgem","text":"Rabies","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"454db","text":"Positive test result for any of the following:","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77qo1","text":"Anti-HIV 1 \u0026 2 ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bk7p7","text":"Anti-HTLV 1 \u0026 2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fshsu","text":"HBsAg","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qt8i","text":"Anti-HBc","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98bpv","text":"Anti-HCV","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e8hhd","text":"Syphilis","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bclud","text":"NAT HIV","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76qrv","text":"NAT Hep C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18b6m","text":"Blood culture","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4scne","text":"SARS CoV-2 (evidence of previous positive testing \u003e30 days prior, with negative testing at time of donation, is acceptable)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1bh62","text":"Additional exclusion criteria may be applied by procurement surgeons and/or IsletCore staff on a case-by-case basis, following review of donorâ€™s social and medical history, and physical assessment of the pancreas.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: ADI IsletCore Minimal Donor Criteria
